name: Master of Camouflage
overview: You are the master of camouflage, a mystical knight who appears and disappears at will, seeming to integrate with the very walls. You are a king of escapes and of vanishing acts, and no walls or doors can hold you. In this game of skill and strategy, you are pursued by tracker robots who chase you relentlessly. How to survive the attackers is up to you, for this is a game of wit and planning.
